pr_title: Extract descriptor fields for Instrument and use autovalue

timeline.bodyText: should this include the library info, so two libraries could have the same instrument descriptor, and not collide?
timeline.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: The instrument descriptor has to be unique inside a MeterSdk which is uniquely identified by the LibraryInfo, so I don't think we should include the LibraryInfo
replies.author: bogdandrutu

timeline.message:
